DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects mail-related events and device information from McAfee Email Gateway appliances.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 5, MailTrafficAudit: Message could not be delivered
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Message could not be delivered to the domain - [-\w.]+: .+\|

FastField.defaultValue: Message could not be delivered to the domain "$4"

FastFormatter.format: Message could not be delivered to the domain "$4", $8
Message could not be delivered to the domain "$4", $8

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Quarantined by Anti-Spam \(Enterprise Spam Profiler\) ESP Score:\d+ Values:

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+)[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|([-\w:.]+)\|\d\|\d+\|Spam Message type: TrustedSource Signature Confidence = (\w+)\. Connection: ([\d.]+)-(\d+)\(IP-Port\), Sender:(.+), RcptList:\[(.+)\]\|\[(.*)\][<\d>]*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Spam Message type: TrustedSource Signature Confidence = \w+\. Connection: [\d.]+-\d+\(IP-Port\), Sender:.+, RcptList:\[.+\]\|

FastField.defaultValue: Message received from "$5", TrustedSource Signature Confidence: $4

FastPattern.description: 12, ServiceInfo: Listed in connection control deny list

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|(?:Secured delivery PULL|Sent to DLP box) by Envelope Analysis\|
^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Delivered using (?:non secure|TLS) delivery mode\. Message deleted\.\|

FastFormatter.format: Failed to send greeting. "$8" Connection dropped
Failed to send greeting. "$8", Port $9 Connection dropped

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Invalid protocol response from destination mail server\. Notification [<>\w: ]+\.\|
^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Mail loop detected\. Message quarantined in Failures Queue\.\|
^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|No response from destination mail server\. Notification [<>\w: ]+\.\|
^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Parse failed\. Message will be delivered to recipient bypassing CFQ\.\|
^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|Socket communication failed with client. Connection dropped\|

FastPattern.description: 28, VirusAttack: Quarantined, Dropped by Virus Scan
29, VirusAttack: File encryption errors by Virus Scan
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+[=\w. ]* \d{8} \d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}\|\d+\|[-\w:.]+\|\d\|\d+\|File encryption errors\(.+\) passed through by Virus Scan Queue\|

FastField.defaultValue: File encryption errors passed through by Virus Scan Queue

FastFormatter.format: Virus "$8" detected. File encryption errors passed through by Virus Scan Queue

FastFormatter.condition: File encryption errors\((.+)\) passed through by Virus Scan Queue
